item.title: Scraping Credly with GitHub Actions
item.description: :trophy: Credly … who? Have you ever heared about the certification sharing platform Credly? It’s a very simple site, with a simple interface that solves a very simple issue: Collecting and showing of certifications in a reliably and trusted way.
